org.opensocial.explorer.server.oauth

Class CheatingBasicOAuthStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shindig.gadgets.oauth.BasicOAuthStore
      • org.opensocial.explorer.server.oauth.CheatingBasicOAuthStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.shindig.gadgets.oauth.OAuthStore

    public class CheatingBasicOAuthStore
extends org.apache.shindig.gadgets.oauth.BasicOAuthStore
    A BasicOAuthStore that "cheats" and returns static values given a service name. It ignores the App URL on the security token. This is done because in the OpenSocial Explorer, a gadget URL will change because it contains a hash. FIXME: Implement a real mechanism that can handle dynamic gadget URLs
